wordlist.definition: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur.
A domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout.
A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together.
To put food into the mouth and chew and swallow it.
To take a liquid into the mouth and swallow.
A small piece of shaped metal with incisions cut to fit the wards of a particular lock.
A four-wheeled road vehicle that is powered by an engine and is able to carry a small number of people.
A woody perennial plant, typically having a single stem or trunk growing to a considerable height.
